attributes.action: Disqualify EU Referendum result as leaders for 'Leave' had misinformed voters.
attributes.additional_details:
Facts misrepresented include:

1. Sending £350 million every week to EU
2. Turkey will be joking the EU

 ..and many more. (Investigation to be launched).
Many people in remote UK areas were influenced by the misrepresentation and lies & hence the results are unfair. Please disqualify this result to undo the damage caused.
attributes.background:
Voters decide on the basis of information provided to them.
'Leave' had misinformed voters with false information & as this decision has significant consequences and must be disqualified and inquiries launched for those who lied or misrepresented facts from both sides.

rejection.details:
It's not clear what you mean by disqualify. We think you want the same action as this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133606
